ComicInfo.Title: Funny Fish!; From the Beyond!; Ghost Vessel!; Herbie and the Sneddiger's Salad Oil
ComicInfo.Summary: Aliens from space have stolen Earth's entire supply of Sneddiger's Salad Oil, and Herbie's mother needs a bottle.
